021import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
022import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.api.callback.Callback;
024
025import java.util.Collection;
026import java.util.UUID;
027
028/**
029 * CurrencyDropCallback
030 *
031 * @author creatorfromhell
032 * @since 0.1.2.0
033 */
034public class CurrencyDropCallback implements Callback {
035
036  private final UUID player;
037  private Currency currency;
038
039  private final Collection<AbstractItemStack<Object>> drops;
040
041  public CurrencyDropCallback(final UUID player, final Currency currency, final Collection<AbstractItemStack<Object>> drops) {
042
043    this.player = player;
044    this.currency = currency;
045    this.drops = drops;
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * The name of this callback.
050   *
051   * @return The name of this callback.
052   */
053  @Override
054  public String name() {
055
056    return "currency_drop";
057  }
058
059  public Collection<AbstractItemStack<Object>> getDrops() {
060
061    return drops;
062  }
063
064  public Currency getCurrency() {
065
066    return currency;
067  }
068
069  public UUID getPlayer() {
070
071    return player;
072  }
073
074  public void setCurrency(final Currency currency) {
075
076    this.currency = currency;
077  }
078}
